entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High 12. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low plus 1 with risk of frost.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 60%
